html:
sold yourselves for naught. Israel gave herself away to sin and received nothing of value in return. Each of us has done the same when we have yielded to sin.

redeemed without money. Money buys the temporal things of the earth but not the spiritual things of heaven. In all ages we are redeemed by the atonement of Christ, not by the currency of earth (45:13; 2 Ne. 9:50-51; Alma 5:33-34).
